mapper.select: SELECT dong_code, sido_name FROM dongcode where right(dong_code,8) = '00000000'
SELECT dong_code, sido_name, gugun_name FROM dongcode WHERE left(dong_code,2) = left(#{code},2) AND right(dong_code,5) = '00000' AND gugun_name is not null
SELECT dong_code, sido_name, gugun_name, dong_name FROM dongcode WHERE left(dong_code,5) = left(#{code},5) AND dong_name is not null
SELECT d.sido_name sidoName,count(*) count , h.lat, h.lng FROM houseinfo h join dongcode d on h.dong_code = d.dong_code group by left(h.dong_code,2);
SELECT d.gugun_name gugunName,count(*) count , h.lat, h.lng FROM houseinfo h join dongcode d on h.dong_code = d.dong_code group by left(h.dong_code,5);
SELECT d.sido_name sidoName, h.lat, h.lng FROM houseinfo h join dongcode d on h.dong_code = d.dong_code group by left(h.dong_code,2) limit 1000000
